The world would come to a complete standstill as people struggle to navigate their daily lives without their memories.
People would rely on technology to remember everything for them, leading to a significant increase in the use of devices like smartphones and computers.
Society would have tovelop a new way of functioning, with people relying on visual cues and other forms of sensory input to remember important information.
There would be a significant increase in crime and chaos as people struggle to identify themselves and others without their memories.
The loss of memory would have a profound impact on individual and collective identity, leading to a reevaluation of what it means to be human.
